title: Gmail server error 5321 while using mailing list
content:
Hello everyone,

I'm experiencing problems using mailing lists in Thunderbird 128.3.3esr (64-bit).

When the mailing list is not expandend i got the error in attachment, it only work if I expand the list.

Any advice ?

Thanks for your time :)
creator: paolochiodino.pro

title: Live Mail. Keeps asking for a new password. Will not let me send mail.
content: As described above. My live mail will not allow me to send mail. Keeps asking for a new password. When I put in a new password it will not accept it. Keeps asking for a new password.
creator: tjnatale

title: OAUTH2
content: I am using Thunderbird to access my Hotmail account. It has been working but now I cannot send emails. My research says I need to change the SMTP authentication method to OAUTH2 but that option is not in the drop down list. Thunderbird says it is currently up to date. How do I fix this?
creator: mrgregpotter

title: Spectrum Email not updating.  Other spectrum still working.
content: I've compared the two emails. One works the other does not. When I get emails this asks for password. So I tried to look up the password in the settings and dmm@chartermi.net did not show but the others did.
creator: dmm5

title: My Thunderbird email client is asking for the new Xfinity password
content: My Thunderbird email client is asking for my Xfinity password which I just changed (at Xfinity) but does not recognize the new password when I enter it.
creator: jtchowhound

title: email address book
content: I would like to send a list of my email addresses to a colleague.
creator: colinmarsden49
